page.title: 03RIVER TRENT AND AMCOTTS
page.content: The square which was surveyed contained a vast area of farmland surrounding part of the River Trent,industry and part of a small village,Amcotts. The majority of the North bank is {arable farmland}.Crops grown are sugar-beet,corn,oil-seed and potatoes. On the South bank of the river is a {ship's agency.}Here cargoes are imported and exported to and from countries mostly from the E.E.C. Up to 520,000 tonnes of substances such as timber,fertiliser,steel,limestone and petrol are handled here.This agency provides 40 people with jobs,generally over 25 years of age who live in a 10 mile radius.The{industry}has been here since the early 20th Century. There are only 8 houses remaining with a population of less than 20.Some houses were destroyed by the nearby
